original: Āryaśrī grahamātṛkā nāma dhāraṇī omnamo bhagavate āryya graha mātṛkāyai om namo sarvaṁbuddha bodhisatbebhya evaṁ mayā śruta mekasmin samaye
analyzed: ārya śrī graha mātṛkā nāma dhāraṇī om namaḥ bhagavate āryya graha mātṛkāyai om namaḥ sarva buddha bodhisatbebhyaḥ eva mayā śruta m ekasmin samaye

original: mahoragāpsarādibhirāditya. somāṁ gāra budha bṛhaspati śukra; śaniścara,
analyzed: mahoraga apsara ādibhiḥ āditya soma āgāra budha bṛhaspati śukra śaniścara

original: rāhu ketubhiraṣṭāviṁ śati nakṣatrādibhistūyamāno mahāvajra samayā laṁkāra byūhonāmabyu tthāyā dhisthānādhiṣṭite siṁhāsane biharatisma ||

analyzed: bajra alakāre ṇa ca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena
bajna bikrame na ca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena

original: padmaketu nāṁca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena ratnaketunāṁca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena ||
analyzed: padmaketu nāca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena ratnaketunā ca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena
maitreyena ṇa ca nāma bodhisatvena mahāsatvena

original: evaṁpramukhai mahābodhisatba śatasahasrai sārddhaṁ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto bhagabān dharma paryyāyaṁ deśa yamtisma ||
analyzed: evapramukhaiḥ mahā bodhisatba śata sahasraiḥ sārddha parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ bhagabān dharma paryyāya deśa yamtisma

original: ādaukalyāṇaṁ madhyekalyāṇaṁ paryya basāne kalyāṇaṁ svarthasuvyañjanaṁ kebalaṁ paripūrṇaṁ pariśuddhaṁ paryyabadātaṁ brahmacaryyaṁ saṁprakāśayatisma
analyzed: ādau kalyāṇa madhye kalyāṇa pari kalyāṇa su artha su vyañjana kebala paripūrṇa pariśuddha paryyabadāta brahmacaryya sa prakāśayati sma

original: atha khalu punarbajrapāṇi bodhisatva staparṣatmaṇḍala mavalokyā sanādutthāya ṛddhyadhiṣṭhānāyā neka bhagavanta makane śatasahasra pradakṣiṇī  #
analyzed: atha khalu punar bajrapāṇi bodhisatvaḥ sta parṣad maṇḍalam avalokya ā sanāt utthāya ṛddhi adhiṣṭhānāyāḥ śata sahasra pradakṣiṇī

original: kṛtya praṇamya puratoniṣadya ratnagarbheṇa paryeka mābhuhya līlayāstatparṣa nmaṇḍala mavalokya bajrājaliṁ svahṛdaye pratiṣṭhāppa bhagavanta  #
analyzed: praṇamya puratas niṣadya ratnagarbheṇa paryekam ābhuhya līlayā asta parṣad maṇḍala mavalokya sva hṛdaye pratiṣṭhāppa bhagavanta

original: grahāśca bhagavānu grānugrarū pāśca raudrāraudra rūpāśca krūrā krararūpāśca satvāviheṭhayanti ||
analyzed: grahāḥ ca raudra a raudra rūpāḥ ca krūra krara rūpāḥ ca

original: keṣāṁcid dravyamapaharanti keṣāṁcid dīrdhāyūḥ satvānāmalpāyū kurvanti;
analyzed: keṣācid dravyam apaharanti keṣācid dīrdhāyūḥ satvānām alpa āyū kurvanti
eva sarva satvām upadra vātaḥ bāhayanti

original: taddeśayatu bhagabān dharmaparyyāyaṁ yena sarvasatvānī sarbopadravebhyaḥ rakṣābhaviṣyati |
analyzed: tat deśayatu bhagabān dharmaparyyāya yena sarva satvānī sarva upadravebhyaḥ rakṣā bhaviṣyati

original: sādhusādhu bajrapāṇe yastvaṁ sarbasatbānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya kṛpā cinta mutpādya guhyāti guhyataraṁ tathāgata samyaksaṁbuddhaṁ paripṛcchasi
analyzed: sādhu sādhu bajrapāṇe yaḥ tva sarva satbānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya kṛpā cinta mutpādya guhya ati guhyatara tathāgata samyaksabuddha paripṛcchasi

original: grahāṇā mugrarūpāṇāṁ kūrātibhīṣaṇa mukhānāṁ mahāguhyoti guhyataraṁ dibyapūjāśca arghaṁca jāppaṁca yathānukrama barṇabhedena sarbeṣāṁ yathā
analyzed: grahāṇām mugra rūpāṇām kūra ati bhīṣaṇa mukhānām dibya pūjāḥ ca argha ca jāppa ca yathānukrama barṇa bhedena sarbeṣām yathā
debatā ca apsarāḥ ca bai kinnarāḥ ca mahā uragāḥ
yakṣāḥ ca rākṣasāḥ ca eba mānuṣāḥ ca eba amānuṣāḥ

original: athakhalu bhagabān śākyamunistathāgato rhantyasamyaksaṁbuddhaḥ svahṛdayāt karūṇā bikrīḍitaṁnāma raśmijāla muccāryya grahāṇāṁ mūddhiṁ prabeśayatiśma
analyzed: atha khalu bhagabān śākyamuniḥ tathāgataḥ rhanti asamyaksabuddhaḥ sva hṛdayāt karūṇāḥ bikrīḍita nāma raśmi jāla muccāryya grahāṇāḥ

original: athatatkṣaṇā debate sarbegrahā ādityā dayotthāyā bhagabanta śākyamuni samyaksaṁbuddhena taddeśa yantu bhagabaṁstā dṛśaṁ dharmaparyyāya sāmagrī  #
analyzed: atha tad kṣaṇāḥ debate sarbe grahāḥ ādityāḥ dayā utthāyāḥ bhagabanta śākyamuni samyaksabuddhena yantu dharmaparyyāya sāmagrī

original: guptiparitrāṇaṁ parigrahaṁ paripālanaṁ śāntisvastyayana daṇḍa parihāraṁ;
analyzed: gupti paritrāṇa parigraha paripālana śānti svastyayana daṇḍa parihāra

original: athakhalu bhagavān śākyamuni stathāgato'rhana samyak saṁbuddho grahāṇāṁ mantrapūjā bhāṣantesma ||
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ samyak sabuddhaḥ grahāṇāḥ mantra pūjāḥ bhāṣante sma
om bhoga āspadāya svāhā om asura uttamāya svāhā

original: imāni bajrapāṇe navagrahāṇāṁ mantra hṛdayāni paṭhitasiddhāni yathānu krama varṇa bhedena diśāca gandha maṇḍalake cintaye padmamadhye dvādaśāṁgula  #
analyzed: imāni bajrapāṇe nava grahāṇā mantra hṛdayāni paṭhita siddhāni yathānu krama varṇa bhedena diśāca gandha maṇḍalake cintaye padma madhye

original: pramāṇaṁ caturasraṁ caturdbāreṇa śobhitaṁ kūṭāgāraṁ cakra samanvitaṁ ||
analyzed: pramāṇa caturasra caturdbāreṇa śobhita kūṭāgāra cakra samanvita

original: tanmadhye sita kamalopari kuṁkuma gandha maṇḍala kecittaye debabhāskaraṁ tāpasa rupadharaṁ raktavarṇa sahasra sūryyakoṭī samaprabho sindhūrabarṇa  #
analyzed: tad madhye sita kamala upari kukuma gandha maṇḍala deva bhāskara tāpasa rupa dhara rakta varṇa sahasra sūrya koṭī sama prabho sindhūra barṇa

original: pūrbasyāṁdiśi raktakamalopari priyaṁgu gandha maṇḍalake somo brāhmaṇa iti jñeyaḥ sitabarṇa jaṭāmakuṭadharaṁ bhuja dbayena akṣasūtra kamaṇaḍalu  #
analyzed: pūrbasyā diśi rakta kamala upari priyagu gandha maṇḍalake somaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ iti jñeyaḥ sita barṇa jaṭā makuṭa dhara bhuja dbayena akṣasūtra kamaṇaḍalu

original: dakṣiṇasyāṁ diśi śukla kamalopari candana gandha maṇḍalake bhichu maṁgāra coktaṁ raktabarṇa ratna makuṭī śakti dharaṁ ||
analyzed: dakṣiṇasyā diśi śukla kamala upari candana gandha maṇḍalake raktabarṇa ratna makuṭī śakti dhara
om namaḥ ūrakta aga saḥ ujvala kumārāya svāhā

original: paścimasyāṁ diśi raktapadmopari kṛṣṇāguru gandhamaṇḍalake brahmacārī budha syāt pītavarṇa raktaśmaśru akṣasūtra kamaṇḍalūdharaṁ ||
analyzed: paścimasyāḥ diśi rakta padma upari kṛṣṇa aguru gandha maṇḍalake brahmacārī budha syāt
om rāja putra su pīta barṇāya budhāya namaḥ svāhā

original: uttarasyāṁdiśi sitakamalopari deva dāru gandhamaṇḍake paribrājako guru ścaiva tapta kāñcana barṇābho raktaśmaśru akṣasūtra kamaṇḍalū dharaṁ
analyzed: uttarasya ādiśi sita kamala upari paribrājakaḥ guru ca eva

original: asya deya dadhibhaktodana kṣīraṁbā ghṛtamadhū dhūpaṁ ||
analyzed: asya deya dadhi bhakta udana kṣīra bā ghṛta madhū dhūpa

original: om lohitabarṇa nirgamāya bṛha spataye namaḥ bhogā spadāyasbāhā || 5 ||
analyzed: om lohitabarṇa nirgamāya bṛha spataye namaḥ bhogāḥ spadāyasbāhā

original: agneyāṁdiśi raktapadmopari candana gandha maṇḍalake śulka pāśa paraśu brahmacārī gokṣīrabarṇā barāmbho jaṭāmakūṭākṣa kamaṇḍalūdharaṁḥ ||
om namaḥ śulkādhipataye asūrottamāya birahe sbāhā || 6 ||
analyzed: om namaḥ śulka adhipataye asūra uttamāya virahe sbāhā

original: naiṛtyāṁdiśi sita kamalopari nīlacandana gandhamaṇḍake śaniścara;
analyzed: naiṛtyā diśi sita kamala upari nīlacandana gandha maṇḍake śaniścara

original: kṛṣṇabarṇa kṣapaṇakojñeyaḥ phaṇāmṛta pītajaṭā makuṭaśmaśruḥ akṣasūtra khikhirikādharaṁ ||
om śaninī lāmbhosaṁ kṛṣṇāya kṛṣṇavarṇāya kṛṣṇabhuk svāhā || 7 ||
analyzed: om śaninī lāmbhosa kṛṣṇāya kṛṣṇa varṇāya kṛṣṇa bhuj svāhā

original: vāyubyāṁdiśi raktāmbhopari tagarapādi gandha maṇḍalake kāpāliko rājābartta barṇanibhorddha debaraha bhayānacayūge daṁṣṭrākarāla bhṛkuṭikṛta  #
analyzed: rakta ambha upari gandha maṇḍalake kāpālikaḥ rājābartta barṇa nibha ūrddha daṣṭra karāla bhṛkuṭi kṛta

original: lalāṭa pañcabarṇa meghamadhyetara bhujābhyāṁ candrasūryya kamalābhi nayasthitaḥ asyadeyaṁ māṁṣābhiṣabhojanaṁ ||
analyzed: lalāṭa pañca barṇa megha madhyetara bhujābhyā candra sūrya kamala ābhi naya sthitaḥ asya deya māṣa abhiṣa bhojana

original: om namo bikaṭa baktāya rudhirāsane rāho bhṛṁgāñjana nibhāya amṛtapribhāya svāhā || 8 ||
analyzed: om namaḥ bikaṭa baktāya rudhirāsane rāho bhṛga añjana nibhāya amṛta pribhāya svāhā

original: īśānyāṁdiśi raktaśaro rūho paripṛkkā gandhamaṇḍalake caṇḍāla keto bhavet ||
dhūmrabarṇa kṛtāñjatāñjali nāgākṛtisvapuccha bhṛta asyabhojana dhṛtapūraka sajjarasadhūpa;
analyzed: dhūmra barṇa kṛtāñjatāñjali nāga ākṛti sva puccha bhṛta asya bhojana dhṛta pūraka sajja rasa dhūpa

original: om dhūmrāmma varṇasaṁnibhāya jyoti ketabe svāhā || 9 ||
analyzed: om dhūmrāmma varṇa sanibhāya jyotiḥ ketabe svāhā
maṇḍala pūrva dvāre buddhaḥ bhagavān dakṣiṇa dvāre bajrapāṇiḥ
uttara dvāre mañjuśrī kumāra pīrvottarakaḥ ṇe

original: ṣaṭbhujā hastadvayena vyākhyānamūdrā dakṣiṇa kulīśadharā vāmepadmacāpadharā ratna makūṭi nīlavajraparyyako pariṣṭhā candrā sana samāśritā ṣoḍaśākārā  #
analyzed: ṣaṣ bhujā hasta dvayena pariṣṭhā candrā sana samāśritā ṣoḍaśa ākārā
maṇḍala pūrva dvāre vāhye dhṛtarāṣṭrasya dadhi bhaktaḥ

original: siṁdhūra sameta yathānu kramabarṇa bhedena patākādeyāḥ ||
analyzed: yathānu krama barṇa bhedena patākā deyāḥ
tathā nukrama barṇa bhedena pūṣpābhiḥ pūjā kartavyā

original: pratyekaṁ dīpodeyā ghṛta madhubhyāṁ śaṁkhaṁpūrayitvā paṁcaratnaṁ prakṣipyārdho deyaḥsarbeṣāṁmūkha pyatodeyamiti ||
analyzed: pratyekam ghṛta madhubhyā śakha pūrayitvā paca ratna prakṣipya ardhaḥ deyaḥ sarbeṣām ūkham iti

original: namaḥ sarbatathāgatebhya. sarbāsā paripūrakebhya. sarbapari pūrṇābhakti.svāhā ||

analyzed: sapta sapta aṣṭa mantra m ekaśas
dadāti bipulā bhogā saubhāgya janayanti api

original: imāni bajrapāṇe nabagrahāṇāṁ mantra hṛdayāni paṭhitatiddhāni ||
yathānu kramabarṇabhe dena gandha maṇḍalakaṁ kṛtvā dvādaśāṁgula pramāṇaṁ maṇḍalamadhye pūjayitavyāni tāmramṛnmaya rupyādi bhājanena arghaṁdatvā  #
analyzed: yathānu krama barṇa bhedena gandha maṇḍalaka kṛtvā dvādaśa agula pramāṇa maṇḍala madhye pūjayitavyāni tāmra mṛd maya rupya ādi bhājanena

original: aṣṭottara śatabārā parijappa paścatpuna bajrapāṇe grahamātṛkā nāma dhāraṇī mantrapadāni saptabārānū ścārayitavyāni ||
analyzed: aṣṭa uttara śata bārā parijappa paścat puna bajrapāṇe grahamātṛkā nāma dhāraṇī mantra padāni sapta bārā anu ścārayitavyāni

original: yaścakhalu puna bajrapāṇe bhikṣu bhikṣu ṇyupāsako pāsikāvā anayāsatvajātīyā;
analyzed: yaḥ cakhalu puna bajrapāṇe bhikṣu bhikṣu anayā sattva jātīyā

original: yaścakhalu vajrapāṇe grahamaṇḍala madhye pujayitvā dinedine bācayiṣyati ||
analyzed: yaḥ ca khalu vajrapāṇe graha maṇḍala madhye pujayitvā dine dine bācayiṣyati
tatas tasya dharma bhānakasya sarva grahā
punar api grahamātṛkā nāma dhāraṇī bhāṣatesma

original: omnama sarba grahānāṁ sarbāṁśā paripurakānīṁ omnamo nakṣatrāṇāṁ ||
analyzed: omnama sarba grahānā sarba āśā paripurakānī omnamaḥ nakṣatrāṇā

original: ombuddhe 2 bajre 2 padme2 sara 2 prasara 2 smara 2 krīḍa 2 krīḍaya 2 mara 2 māraya 2 mardaya 2 ghātaya 2 mama sarbasatvānāṁca sarvabighrān  #
analyzed: ombuddhe bajre padme sara prasara smara krīḍa krīḍaya mara māraya mardaya ghātaya mama sarva sattvān āca sarva bighrān

original: chinda 2 bhinda 2 sarbavi ghrānnāśaya 2 kuru 2 mamasaparibārasya sarbasatvānāṁca kāryya kṣepaya 2 sarvapāpāni mamasaparivārebhyaḥ śānte 2 dānte  #
analyzed: chinda bhinda kuru kuru mamasa paribārasya kṛru sarva pāpāni mamasa parivārebhyaḥ śānte dānte

original: 2 dāpaya 2 dutaṁdarśayātmāna bhagavati rakṣa 2 mamasarva satvānāṁca sarvagraha nakṣatra pīḍānivāraya bhagavatiśreyaṁ kuru mahāmāyā prasādhaya  #
analyzed: dāpaya bhagavati rakṣa sarva graha nakṣatra kuru mahāmāyā prasādhaya

original: sarbaduṣṭāṁ nāśaya 2 sarvaṁpāpāni mamasaparivārasya candre 2 candrani 2 turu 2 muru 2 mū 2 mūñca 2 bhavābhave ugrāugra tapātape puraya bhagavati  #
analyzed: sarva duṣṭāḥ nāśaya sarva pāpāni candre candrani bhava abhave ugra augra tapa ātape bhagavati

original: manorathaṁ mamasarva satvānāṁca sarvanakṣatra graha pīḍā nibāraya sarvaṁ tathāgatā dhiṣṭhānāṁdhiṣṭhite samaye svāhā ||
analyzed: manoratha sarva nakṣatra graha pīḍā nibāraya sarva tathāgatāḥ dhiṣṭhāna adhiṣṭhite samaye svāhā
om dharaṇīsutāya sbāhā om budhāya svāhā om bṛhaspataye sbāhā om śukrāya sbāhā
om sarba grahāṇā sbāhā om sarba nakṣatrāṇā sbāhā

original: omsarvopadrabo sarbabidyai huṁ2phaṭ 2 sbāhā imāni bajrapāṇe grahamātṛkā nāma dhāraṇī kārtika māse śulka pakṣe saptamī mārabhya poṣadhikobhūtbā  #
analyzed: om sarvopadrabo sarba bidyai sbāhā imāni bajrapāṇe grahamātṛkā nāma dhāraṇī kārtika māse śulka pakṣe saptamīm ārabhya

original: yā caturdaśī graha nakṣatra maṇḍala dine 2 saptavārā nuccārayitabyā ||
analyzed: yā caturdaśī graha nakṣatra maṇḍala dine sapta vārā nu uccārayitabyā

original: tataḥ pūrṇamāsyā mahorātraṁ pūjā kṛtbā vācayentasya navanavati varṣāṇi mṛtyubhayaṁ nabhavati ||
analyzed: tatas pūrṇamāsyāḥ mahorātra pūjā kṛtbā vācayentasya navanavati varṣāṇi
ulkā pāta graha pīḍā bhaya na bhaviṣyati

original: athate sarve grahāḥ sādhū bhagavanniti praṇabhyāṁttarhito bhavanniti ||
analyzed: atha te sarve grahāḥ sādhū bhagavan iti praṇabhyāt tarhitaḥ bhavan iti

original: idamavocaṭ bhagavān nāntamanā steca bhikṣavaḥ sāca sarbāvatī parṣatsa debamānuṣāḥsura,
analyzed: idam avocat bhagavān na antamanāḥ ste ca bhikṣavaḥ sā ca sarbāvatī parṣad sa deba mānuṣāḥ sura
mahā uragāḥ bhagavataḥ bhāṣitam abhya nandan iti
